items.sentence: The governor issued a reprieve hours before Tom was set to be executed by lethal injection.
Tom is a much better French speaker than I am, but I can usually still get my ideas across.
I know that my grammar isn't perfect, but people seem to understand what I'm trying to say.
Tom was able to get eerily beautiful tunes out of a saw which he played using a violin bow.
We know that we need to buy more of these. The only question is how many do we need to buy.
